website_summaries.verdict: The TerraMaster F2-221 is a dual-drive NAS that performs well and comes with some helpful features, but it's hampered by a difficult setup process and meager tech support.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking NAS box
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but needs its own app running within Windows. Even though I filled it with disks it only reports seeing the first one, The instructions are not very clear. I am sure that in due course it will work but the amount of time needed to "try this and try that" is more than I feel I should spend on it. I am replacing my Drobo boxes and the difference between installing those and this box is very marked. Having said that, it runs silently and is unobtrusive.
customer_reviews.author: Dutchy

customer_reviews.title: It’s silent and looks great. And does the job just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Since this will sit on my desk I was a little concerned that I’d have a noisy and intrusive device disrupting my concentration. You can see however that compared to the size of a box of matches that it is very compact. And importantly for me, it is almost silent even when it is fully active. It was also comparatively easy to set up even for me – and I’m no IT expert. It’s been running for about a month now and we’ve had no problems whatsoever. We use it for transferring video files but it can also be helpful as an extra drive for holding archived material.
customer_reviews.author: CraigHP

customer_reviews.title: F5 421
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up. Installed 4 x tosh n300 6tb running raid 10 to use as a server. Not worked out what to do with the 5th slot!. Plex works well. I have a separate dedicated 8tb backup drive as using raid in this is not technically a back up solution. .certain raid configs give you some redundancy. I am just being over cautios i gues as i nearly lost a lifetime of photos.
customer_reviews.author: g woodley

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if you dont want to lose everything
customer_reviews.text: You certanly get what you pay for. Ignoring the fact that if you try to copy two things it it at once it has a metldown and stops until you canel one of the copies, it resets itself and wipes the drives. I've lost all media i had. Pointless having a RAID setup if wipes both drives. It's going in the bin.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain if looking for a NAS.
customer_reviews.text: May not be as refind as some, but it is a very well made item and does the job well. Easy to set up although I did need some assistance from Terra techies to clarify rather than setup itself. This was only via email, but they did get back to me quickly. Fan is a bit noisy at times and I did expand the memory. Over all a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Boys

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and easy nas
customer_reviews.text: Really good easy to use Nas, I use it to run bit torrent along with multiple dockers. Streams 4k no problem over a lan network. Set up was easy. It's slightly noisy but that's because of the mixture of harddrives I have in it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the box
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to install. Not so easy in the instructions side of things unless you are already aware of the technology and expertise required to run one of these properly. Comes with more than a few nice free Apps that can be quite useful.
customer_reviews.author: Jockster

customer_reviews.title: A Brilliant little Nas!!!
customer_reviews.text: As I'm new to the Nas scene I wanted something straight forward not to difficult to setup.. And this little machine provided that..Attaching the Hard drives very easy, Setting up the server straight forward.. My main purpose was to use Plex and Emby easy as pie just install the apps sign-in happy days..I even upgraded the memory not difficult at all..I Have to say I'm very happy with the system and highly recommend.. Faultless good job Terra Master!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Apple Time Machine not easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: The NAS was easy to setup, however to get Apple Time Machine working was not easy, as it was blocked by the permissions of an added user. The admin account did however worked straight away. Easier instructions how to setup Apple Time Machine for another user than the admin account would be helpful. Works now over a week without any problem, so very satisfied for now.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian - UK

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This is about as much use as a chocolate fire guard. It will not connect to my pc as it fails to respond. I cannot return it either now as I am away with work. Steer clear of this product it is a waste of money. It keeps saying the device is online but isn’t responding to connection attempts.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love this nas drive. The interface is nice and slick and easy to navigate. The system is quick and handles everything I throw at it. I had slight issue with app store after an upgrade and tech support were just amazing. They have kept me informed throughout the fix. Terramaster are the best don't pay more for no gain.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Liddiard

customer_reviews.title: Great Nas
customer_reviews.text: No issues on setup, working very well as a home Nas
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Rawlingson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and an improving OS
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is easy to use, the os is good, however the app version for phones could use some more features. Can host plex and web server
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good NAS
customer_reviews.text: Good NAS for home use. Not had any problems and was easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical but it’s actually pretty awesome. You get a BitTorrent client and a Plex media server. It’s easy to set up and use 👍
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Irving

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective and easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: A good device with easy setup and install processes. Fits the office requirements with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was new to this type of tech. This was easy to set up and good online support when I got a bit stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Miss J D Dale

customer_reviews.title: CCTV recording
customer_reviews.text: Well made but i was expecting to record my CCTV and it doesn’t have an app to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Lenard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect NAS for Home
customer_reviews.text: Fantasic NAS for home & advanced users, I've used Docker to install NextCloud which is accessible outside our home network with my domain. This NAS has totally replaced my paid Dropbox subscription at a much more reasonable price than similar solutions.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product Easy to setup and use Excellent for Plex Server as well
customer_reviews.author: Wajid Malik

customer_reviews.title: Improved NAS
customer_reviews.text: In the past i have used other Terramaster NAS units and using the F2-221 shows that Terramaster is improving their devices. One of the things that i have loved to see is that the app store is getting more and more aps and that will give us the option to do more with the same hardware. Was easy to setup, silent and easy to use. Hopefully the video is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Super NAS Drive
customer_reviews.text: Being a relative novice when it comes to NAS drives I spent sometime researching which one would suit me. I settled on this Terramaster F2-421 and I'm not disappointed. The main functions I required was something to run Plex and something to give reliable data storage capabilities, this device does that effortlessly. In the six months I've had my drive I can't pretend that everything has gone without a hitch, but the minor trouble I have had has been sorted out with speed and professionalism by Terramaster's Technical Support (In particular Lingo & Gina). In summary I would certainly recommend the Terramaster F2-421 - 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Liberty Eagle Publishing Ltd.

customer_reviews.title: Very poor Reliability
customer_reviews.text: Failed after 6 months. Tried a brand new pair of WD Drives, still no show. I see they're all on Black Friday deals now! Fancy that! Thank God I had an additional USB drive plugged into the back ! Previously, I had a Freenas setup, which ran for 5 years, without trouble. That's was a small ITX PC with the OS on a memory stick! Before that I had a Toshiba NAS, which also failed in a very short time. If you're going to buy any sort of dedicated NAS system, it needs to be Enterprise Quality hardware, otherwise you're wasting your time! Now got a refund from Amazon and bought a Qnap at twice the price !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Ford

customer_reviews.title: Super Device
customer_reviews.text: The F2-221 NAS 2bay Cloud Storage Intel Dual-Core bought couples of months ago is still rocking as if it was purchased today. It is an absolute good value for money and ideal for family cloud storage. Its a must-have for all the tech geeks out there. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cosmas Amuji

product_meta.title: TerraMaster F2-221 NAS 2bay Cloud Storage Intel Dual Core 2.0GHz Plex Media Server Network Storage (Diskless)
feature_bullets: POWERFUL HARDWARE: Intel Apollo J3355 2.0GHz dual-core CPU, and 2GB of RAM (expandable up to 4GB). Blazingly fast speed of 200 MB/s reading and 190 MB/s writing.
AES hardware encryption engine encrypts shared folders and network data transmission to keep data from unauthorized access.
Advanced Btrfs file system offering 71,680 system-wide snapshots and 1,024 snapshots per shared folder.
Real-time hardware transcoding of up to two concurrent 4K video streaming

Features an aluminum-alloy shell and intelligent temperature control ultra-quiet fan, good in heat dissipation. Support Seagate IHM. For stable performance, it is recommended to use Seagate IronWolf and WD Red hard drives.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars162 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
